website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive, long-lasting, available in multiple hues, and super simple to use, this Maybelline concealer is an efficient solution for smaller tattoos.
pros: Available in five colors to suit a range of skin tones
A little goes a long way
cons: While this is an excellent tattoo concealer, it would be nice to see darker shades

customer_reviews.title: It has good coverage
customer_reviews.text: I fell and had two black eyes. They are healing but not fast enough so I bought this concealer. See photos
customer_reviews.author: Paula A. Moors

customer_reviews.title: My go to concealer!
customer_reviews.text: I'm closing in on 70, and the only thing I can say about this is WoW! I am not fond of the tube application, but I squeeze a tiny bit onto my hand and then use a brush, like from an artist's palette, for precise placement. It is long lasting (I apply it over a primer), doesn't cake, or settle in fine lines, and it conceals my dark circles better than anything I've ever found. Frankly, I have about three other concealers (always looking for the best one), and I can throw them all away. This is my keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Little Hail Storm

customer_reviews.title: I don't notice a big difference
customer_reviews.text: As a man, I was looking for something to cover the darker tone under my eyes. From the reviews, this seemed to be worth a try. It is a bit lighter than I expected, as some said to go one shade lighter. Honestly, I don't notice much difference after I apply it. The only thing I see is more attention to my wrinkled skin and bags. It isn't obvious that I'm wearing concealer, unless my friends are simply too kind to tell me. It is easy to apply and seems to go a long way with a little amount. It doesn't work on my age spots. It simply creates a lighter spot around the darker age spot.
customer_reviews.author: Induetime

customer_reviews.title: Not for dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this concealer after seeing raving reviews about it being an amazing drugstore option.. But it’s not if you have dry skin. It’s a sticky concealer which I like but you have to move quickly or it adheres to where you first applied it, definitly a concealer I’d recommend using a sponge with. I’ve worn it for long days and nights and it always looks good by the time I’m ready to remove my makeup, but I will probably be saving it for the summer when I don’t have to worry about it settling into my fine undereye lines.
customer_reviews.author: xsarai

customer_reviews.title: This concealer has won🏅
customer_reviews.text: It's my favorite so far. When they said full coverage, trust me they weren't kidding at all. I've tried tooooo many brands to hide my dark circles, but they all tend to be very thin even when I apply many layers. This one is the bom! I pick the color "fair", I have a light greek/ Mediterranean skin tone, and it gave me that bright look from just one coat. It's beautiful, so I said you know what! I'm gonna use it as a highlight, and it works wonderful. It's a little thick so just few dots here and there will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage but creases
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize the covert until I took this pic, left with no makeup and right with this concealer and powder. It creases though and doesn’t last all day.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Madsen

customer_reviews.title: Great Drugstore Option
customer_reviews.text: I usually use MaryKay's concealer. However, I have been looking for products that are slightly less expensive but provide the same great coverage/look/feel. This concealer is about 1/2 the price of the MaryKay version and gives you almost twice as much. There are less color choices with Maybelline, however, the fair still matches my skin tone well enough that you can't tell the difference when wearing either this or the MaryKay. It covers just as well for me, goes on smoothly, and lasts longer. That's a win/win/win for me. Highly recommend this product if you are looking for something cheaper but still quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had dark circles under my eyes since I was very young. Over the years, I have tried countless concealers, from cheap ones to very expensive ones and never found one that worked... Until now. I bought this one a few months ago and it is, by far, the best one out there! I have received countless complements, and feel much happier and prettier.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Concealer really does cover any imperfections.
customer_reviews.text: I really love this concealer! This was probably the 10th bottle I have bought in the past year. Honestly it helps prevent creasing under the eyes and hides any acne or other imperfections you are trying to conceal. It really does work better than all my high end concealers such as the it cosmetics bye-bye undereye and the taste shape tape. You don't need alot of product to conceal imperfections and it never looks cakey.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing coverage!!!
customer_reviews.text: Long lasting. Full coverage. I have very dark circles and I need something very thick that will stay on for hours. This is my go to concealer!! I'm tan but order a shade lighter. It's always best to brighten up below the eyes. I love this concealer!! I can't say enough good things about it!! And trust me, my dark circles are ridiculously dark! It's the one piece of makeup I won't leave home without!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheilajvp

customer_reviews.title: Fair is not Fair
customer_reviews.text: The coverage of this concealer is really good, and I got it in the shade Fair, since I'm really pale, but sadly, it's was still too dark and yellowish for my skin tone, and I have warm undertones, sometimes cool. If you are pretty fair skinned but you you need good coverage, try this; it's good for the price. If you have a white mixer foundation, you can mix it in with this concealer; it really helps and you don't need much white mixer. :) I hope this helps. As for what kind of white mixer I used, I have nyx pro foundation mixer and la girl pro coverage; both are drugstore cheap and work amazing; both are silicone based.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, Effective Concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great concealer. I have many patches of discoloration on my face and even around my collarbone from sun exposure. I didn't expect an inexpensive concealer to be so effective, but it is. The tube dispenses the creamy cover-up in very small dabs - just right for careful application. Blush, eye makeup and other cosmetics apply easily over this concealer. It makes a big difference in my appearance. My face and neck look brighter and younger. Oh, and you only need to use a little, so it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Love

customer_reviews.title: Too Chalky
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this product after I ran out of my Covergirl concealer. I gave it a chance but it was wayyy too chalky and difficult to apply. I had to go and physically find my other concealer. It also wasn't as smooth on my face when applied with my foundation.
customer_reviews.author: LadyChandler

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me!
customer_reviews.text: I am a vampire so I got the light and I should have gotten the fair but it still worked well enough for me and spread easily which was nice and didnt look fake or anything. I liked it a fair lot, and even though the container is rather small like a bit smaller than my pinky [I'm a dude so maybe bigger for you] it lasted for a rather long time. Now I dont use this every day but whenever I go out, meet someone, etc. Whenever I need the extra confidence boost none the less will be getting more for sure! Helps with covering up my acne.
customer_reviews.author: Leo B.

customer_reviews.title: Covers blemishes the same way white out covers ink on paper
customer_reviews.text: So i was really excited mostly by the amount of concealer that comes in this tube but it just wasnt what i wanted. Its not blendable at all You must get the exact color of your skin and use a tiny dot where ever you have a blemish. It covers but it works literally exactly the way white out works on paper. Its thick and if you try to use it on a large area you look like youre melting I hate this product. I can see it being useful for things like covering moles or chicken pox lol but i ruined my make up and had to start all over 8 out of 10 times i used it
customer_reviews.author: Logan janel

customer_reviews.title: BETTER than high-end
customer_reviews.text: I SWEAR by this concealer. I have tried EVERY SINGLE high-end brand from both Ulta and Sephora, as well as several drug store brands in desperate search for the best concealer - this is IT. Kid you not. This concealer covers even the hardest-to-cover blemishes and spots, without being super thick and sticky. It feels light weight, but provides amazing coverage. Take my word for it, you won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Savana Salmon

customer_reviews.title: This concealer works great! For the price
customer_reviews.text: This concealer works great! For the price, it is outstanding. Not only is the coverage great (it's pretty thick), but I was also really happy with the shade. I'm very fair, and drugstore brands usually fail to deliver a shade light enough - not the case with this concealer! I am using it under my eyes (for a brightening effect), and I think it's doing just as well as a much more expensive department store brand.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage concealer
customer_reviews.text: This product is very thick and has amazing coverage. This concealer is only necessary for those ladies who may have acne, acne scars or any other dark marks or pigmentation. It is thick and a little goes a long way. It will cover most anything while looking natural. I apply regular foundation first, then I use this on the problem areas, then set with powder. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Try this you will love it! A great great deal for the money and better than the pricey stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, thank you, thank you to all of the fellow Amazon reviewers who gave this great reviews! This is much better than my very expensive brand name, I will leave out the names, but they were very expensive, concealers! Lasts all day day with no raccoon eyes without looking too heavy! I am 54 years old and this stuff is fantabulous!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't ask for anything more!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this concealer for about a year now, consistently, and it's one of the most reliable I think I've ever used. It's also extremely versatile, it can be built up for a full coverage, or it can be applied with a very damp sponge for a lighter coverage. I use two shades, fair for my under eyes and light for blemishes, when I have them. I would choose this foundation over anything high end any day of the week. It performs flawlessly and better, in fact, than some of it's higher end counter parts.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT DELIVERED DAMAGED! WILL NOT ALLOW A RETURN!
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT 2 OF THESE FOR MY DAUGHTER. ONE TUBE WAS DELIVERED CRACKED AND OOZING OUT OF TUBE. I TRIED TO SET UP A RETURN AND IT IS NOT ALLOWED ON THIS PRODUCT! BAD BUSINESS PRACTICE IF YOU ASK ME.....WE WILL RE-THINK ORDERING AGAIN......THIS IS JUST NOT A RIGHT WAY TO DO BUSINESS.
customer_reviews.author: Bob in Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Coverup up or contouring, it does both!
customer_reviews.text: Used in conjuction with the Maybelline Fit Me foundation - this concealer blends perfectly! Easy to apply and you only need a little bit. Affordable price with great results. I also use it for contouring which makes this a perfect buy for me! My skin is combination dry to normal. I usually like to moisturize before applying any liquid makeup, makes it blend much better with my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Luna4x0

customer_reviews.title: Not good for pale cool tones.
customer_reviews.text: It's thick and yellow toned. I bought the lightest shade avelible. Don't buy if you are a porcelain. The product does a good job of covering so if you do have more yellow toned skin it might work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and tried it. YES!!! It works!!!! At first I thought I put too much on my cheek and would have to wipe some off but it spread out great. Plus, it worked. It covered well. I have very fair skin and the shade was perfect for me. I will buy this now soon as my tube gets low. I recommend this. I have a bit of Rosacea on my cheeks and a small amount covered it all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fair skin) and it covers nicely without creasing
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Fair. I'm not a fan of liquid concealer, but luckily this was the right shade for me (blonde, fair skin) and it covers nicely without creasing under my eyes. I still prefer solid concealers that come in a little compact, but I bought this to meet my $25 min for free ship. Be careful, a little goes a long way and it dries quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect under eye concealer
customer_reviews.text: Are usually buy all of my make up at Sephora or Ulta. After watching a YouTube review, I decided to purchase this. This is my new favorite concealer for under the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin and not great coverage
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite concealer. It's thin with poor coverage and the light color is also darker than a typical light concealer is. It also seems to be a little on the oily side. Does better with under eye coverage than covering blemishes. Won't be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, But Not Opaque
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect match for my natural "strawberry red head" pink to, ah, over red skin tones, in the "fair" shade. Smooths easily, undetectable (if you correctly match skin tone). No greasiness or caking. Coverage seems decent. Cons are: really, really, tiny tube! And not a cover for serious redness issues. It is not opaque enough.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperGrrl

customer_reviews.title: Great for spot coverage, NOT for under eye!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this concealer for covering up spots on my face and neck. The consistency is good, not too runny and not too thick. I am very fair, so I do wish they had a color lighter than this that wasn't as yellow-tinted. I do NOT like this concealer for my under eyes because it sits in every crease and does not look good at all. Even after baking with powder it still looks horrible, so I do not recommend this concealer for that use.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing! I have a minor case of rosacea
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I have a minor case of rosacea. This covers so easily that sometimes I actually wear this over my prominent red areas with powder and nothing else. Most products go into the crevices of your skin and can enhance your wrinkles but this doesn't do that. I have a light to medium skin tone and went with the light. The color was perfect. May have to change for the upcoming summer tan but for winter, it worked great. Would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: So glad I found this!
customer_reviews.text: I am very self conscious about my under eye area and not a fan of my freckles. I've purchased countless products and although some did an "okay" job, I still wasn't feel great. I have no idea how I found this product but I am so freakin' glad that I did! It covers under my eyes perfectly and makes me feel like I'm in my 20s again!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: I like this concealer
customer_reviews.text: I like this concealer. I had seen another review online and decided to try. My skin is not very good or smooth and I struggle with make up, I have a lot of redness in my face overall, mostly in the cheeks and simple things like laughing accentuate the redness which I hate, so I try to cover a bit with make up. I use this concealer in my face before applying the foundation. It spreads and covers nicely. I would say its tickness is medium and it covers well my imperfections and redness. I will likely buy it again when I finish this one,
customer_reviews.author: Priscila Baretta Mandryk

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I've honestly never had a concealer that lived up to it's purpose like this one. I have many scars and I always use them as a test to see how well it conceals. Usually I can clearly see the scars. But with this? They're SO difficult to see. And helps conceal acne. I absolutely love this and have found my new favorite concealer.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Marzullo

customer_reviews.title: Very full
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I have very oily skin and I use it to spot cover pimples. You barely need any, and it is extremely full coverage. I’ve used it under my eyes a couple of times but it creased heavily so I would not recommend that. Also works as an eyeshadow base.
customer_reviews.author: Lolobagogo

customer_reviews.title: Truly Concealing and Longlasting
customer_reviews.text: This is the most effective, longlasting concealer I've found. I've bought many other brands and types... I fell for glitzy advertising... but they were wasted money. (I hate it when I'm gullible! ) This truly conceals dark undereye areas and other pigmentation problems.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha in Tucson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. However the last one I received seemed like it was old and maybe sitting around for a while. It was really watery. I shook it up each time before use to see if that helped but most of the time it didn’t. I do recommend this product though especially for dark under eye circles. I’m very fair skinned and this is perfect for me. I use the light shade not lightest one
customer_reviews.author: Kate Lin

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty thick concealer. I got too light of a color so I have to mix it with something darker. Can’t tell if it’s making me break out but it works to cover any imperfections
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Warren

customer_reviews.title: Magic in Make Up
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is magic for any blemishes, dark circles, etc. I have a really hard time finding a concealer I like and am a bit self conscious about the area under my eyes- this product is incredible. I have been using it for about a year and nothing else compares.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia swanson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It took forever to find the shade for me. I was going to purchase a high end brand that matched perfectly but wanted to try a long standing brand yet affordable brand first and I'm very pleased with the results. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: BabyGurl

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Wish they had lighter shades.
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer, it does amazing. However, I use it like most people today to highlight my face. I do wish they had lighter shades as this seems too close to my skin tone, and my skin tone is beige which is weird. Otherwise, really good.
customer_reviews.author: flutistjimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage!
customer_reviews.text: I have used TONS of concealers over the years, and this was the first one that I loved. I have some very obvious skin pigmentation issues, and this is the only thing that seems to hide it well, without making my face break out. I use it like foundation under powder. It's amazing. I wish I could get a whole case at once, because I go through the little tube so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: notanothernickname

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I have an olive skin tone and I get the light to medium. I don't have problem skin, just a couple blemishes here and there. I apply the concealer over my Loreal Lumi Glotion (I also get this in light), and it makes a difference. You can still see the blemish slightly if you're looking for it, but it makes a significant difference.
customer_reviews.author: tallgal

customer_reviews.title: Allergic
customer_reviews.text: At first it seemed fine, but after regular use, it caused the skin under my eye to peel, so be careful if you have sensitive skin or prone to allergies
customer_reviews.author: Toxaway17

customer_reviews.title: If you’re wondering whether or not you should buy this, buy it! Thank me later
customer_reviews.text: Maybelline’s New York Face Studio Concealer is one of the best drug-store concealers out there! This reminds me of Makeup Forever’s concealers! The only difference is literally the price. If you’re wondering whether or not you should buy this, buy it! Thank me later
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Manzanares

customer_reviews.title: Does a Great Job Concealing
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this as it's a Maybelline product and I trust them. I am not disappointed in it. It does a wonderful job when I have some darker areas under my eyes and the little redness I have a few other places. I'll have to get a little darker of a concealer come late spring, early summer as this one will be too light. I'll go a shade up.
customer_reviews.author: Scattered Energy

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Has a bit of a tacky feel, which I like I'm terms of getting other product to stick. I would recommend going a shade lighter than you normally would for concealer. Overall it's great for the price point and I haven't had any complaints yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've very fair & have been looking for a concealer for years that isn't too dark. At last, I've found it!! This work SO well. My only caveat is that I wish it had an applicator like the ones that have a squishy top & you turn the tube to get out the product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lerner

customer_reviews.title: Conceals dark under eye circles
customer_reviews.text: Love this, it covers my DARk under eye circles which is why I purchased this. Honestly if covers them up better than any other concealer I’ve found, so I’m happy with it. It’s thick and creamy. I only use it on the problem areas that I want concealed and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way! It doesnt take much at all. I think it may run lighter than expected. Overall happy with it and price.
customer_reviews.author: Doubet

customer_reviews.title: ... little skinny long tub but the concealer itself is great nice coverage
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a concealer you can buy in a huge tub lol because it's a little skinny long tub but the concealer itself is great nice coverage
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: I think this would be an awesome under eye concealer for most people
customer_reviews.text: I think this would be an awesome under eye concealer for most people. It is decent for me, but I have super super dark under eye circles. This is the best drug store concealer I have found (Other than Colour pop) but it is not as much coverage as the it cosmetics bye bye under eye. The color match for me is better though.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle@Book Briefs

customer_reviews.title: I love this concealer
customer_reviews.text: I love this concealer! It perfectly covers up the purple bags under my eyes, not to mention any acne or red spots I have.
customer_reviews.author: Katie P

customer_reviews.title: Go-to budget concealer
customer_reviews.text: For higher coverage, I like to dab it on under my eyes and wait a bit for it to get more tacky before I blend it out with my finger tips. This concealer is also good if you want to build up coverage w multiple layers. While there is good coverage, it does tend to crease under the eyes after a few hours, so touch ups may be needed.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't cover dark circles
customer_reviews.text: I ended up getting a refund because it didn't cover up my dark circles at all. It might work on covering up pimples or redness but definitely didn't help me under my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: The best concealer! Be sure to set with powder so ...
customer_reviews.text: The best concealer! Be sure to set with powder so it won't "melt" off your face, and use a setting spray!
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Charette

customer_reviews.title: In Love!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST consealer I've ever used! I love this stuff. I will need to get a different color during the summer but it's wonderful! It covers wrinkles, acne, blemishes and more!
customer_reviews.author: Sirena

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: This little tube is wonderful. You don't need much and it covers well. Goes on smooth put on this morning last all day. Thank-you Maybelline and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Double A

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to find some real heavy concealer to help cover scars, spots, tattoos and etc. This is by far the best that I've run across that isn't expensive. I will definitely continue getting this product.
customer_reviews.author: Carina B

customer_reviews.title: Not what the description said it was
customer_reviews.text: This was Barry overrated in the ad I was led to believe it would cover my redness and my brown spots however it did not it was worse than my full coverage foundation
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: My ride or die
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is high coverage, lightweight, and buildable. I've been using it for so many years now. I always opt for a lower-end product of high quality because I can't always afford high-end makeup. Worth it! It would be nice for there to be a better shade range. I use light/medium.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Donado

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: I do like the product, I have very heavy dark under eyes. I wish that it would cover up more. For the most part this product is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: This is my go to cover up concealer. I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to cover up concealer. I have a bit of vitiligo on my face and it helps to blend the lines and goes well under my foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Mistimtn

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job.
customer_reviews.text: This concealer really helps on on those "morning after"s. It helps cover the dark circles under my eyes, but doesn't feel heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer for me
customer_reviews.text: Best concealer for me. Half the time my local Kroger is out of stock. But it is cheaper on here so it’s a win for me. I use the light/medium shade. I always have the hardest time matching my skin tone with any makeup. Found this one a long time ago and haven’t been able to find anything better. I use under eyes and on hyper pigmentation left over from years of acne. It’s great honestly!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah wedthoff

customer_reviews.title: Good blending concealer
customer_reviews.text: Amazing concealer I use it for dark circles It blends very well Just gets little watery sometimes But works amazing Definitely will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: It’s up to you.
customer_reviews.text: This product is a little on the thick side, but for the purpose of covering up almost anything I guess it would have to be. I bought it to help cover up a tattoo and it nearly did the job in two layers. The reason it only receives three stars is because it wiped off so easily and left an oily residue.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Won't cover up darker areas
customer_reviews.text: May work ok for lighter stretch marks but doesn't really hide darker ones much (does lighten them some which makes them harder to see). Didn't work on tattoos at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin N.

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite drugstore concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite drugstore concealer. Sometimes I don't even wear any foundation of bb cream and just use this either for my full face of just the problem/discolored areas. Really highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This concelear is great. Covers up your blemishes and dark spots. Don’t need much. Just make sure u buy the right shade for your coloring.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee12

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, smooth and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product, blends in very easily. Stays long till evening. I wear it everyday for my work makeup. Have already ordered it twice. Will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Great product! not-so-great applicator
customer_reviews.text: Great concealer! I often have trouble with getting a good color and good coverage, this one is both. It really is excellent at covering and it does not require a lot at a time or reapplication. The not drawback is the applicator. It is just a tapered tube opening, which makes it a bit imprecise in placement and amount applied.
customer_reviews.author: FLprof

customer_reviews.title: maybe it was just the shade but i feel like this provided minimal to no coverage
customer_reviews.text: This product comes out of the tube separated with oil in it. I think the shade I got was very yellow, maybe it was just the shade but i feel like this provided minimal to no coverage. I wouldn't buy it again and i think I've used it 2 or 3 times only because i did not have any other concealer
customer_reviews.author: megbrockkk

customer_reviews.title: amazing coverage
customer_reviews.text: This goes on flawlessly, covers imperfections without looking cakey, and a little bit goes a long way. It is the best concealer I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Blends and doesn’t look like you’re wearing concealer
customer_reviews.text: Great value, great product! the best cover I’ve found yet! stays, looks like your wearing nothing. Blends really well!
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This concealer is great and it blends nicely. I am happy they have this super light color cause I am pasty!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn0990

customer_reviews.title: two stars
customer_reviews.text: OK coverage. It has a very strange consistency once applied, it can seem a little too think at times and doesn't blend well on my skin. Tends to separate and leave a very weird layer on my face that is noticeable. I also did not like the way it sat under my eyes. I used this for a while and tried to like but realized I actually hated it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Best concealers for less money
customer_reviews.text: Love this concealer. I use to buy it at Walmart until Rhett stopped selling them. Love how Amazon has EVERYTHING I need!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Rose-Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good concealer for the price, fits perfect in a little clutch. I will buy this again
customer_reviews.author: nathan drouin

customer_reviews.title: doesn't cover all that well
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product for about 3 weeks and find it is too thick and the color kind of orange. With that said it still doesn't cover very well. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: nancy salmon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: To me the best over the counter concealer. It was this price at Walmart now its almost $7 to buy but not on Amazon its true to the price. Great Concealer
customer_reviews.author: Denise Sabillon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to hide acne scars
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to use makeup. This is literally the only thing I use. Matches my sking color and is pretty easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela S.

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: The formula is thick and creamy. It covers well and provides great overall coverage. It doesn't crease throughout the day and matches my skin really well.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage for dark circles.
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage for light skin! It does get a bit patchy after several hours but not too bad. Is the best for the value I have found. Applied with a damp beauty blender.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren12345

customer_reviews.title: Best concealer for those on a budget
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best concealer I've found that didn't make me cringe at the price.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Good concealer!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has dry skin I wish they were a bit more moisturizing! Otherwise they're great for the money
customer_reviews.author: Tania Urbina Alva

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping but not a great product
customer_reviews.text: Gets cakey even after I set it. If you wear contacts it will get all in your eyes and contacts.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana G. Zamora

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I've been using it for my highlighter for a while now and it goes on so nicely. I like liquids more than powders for anything because you don't look cakey. Definitely should purchase!
customer_reviews.author: kemoe3

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Best concealer I have ever used, however I hate how little the container is. I hope and pray they keep making this forever.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Christoe

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this more than some of the more expensive brands I've tried in the past
customer_reviews.author: Cristela Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Buy
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite wish it has an application brush seems high end but cheap love that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s functional.
customer_reviews.text: Application is smooth but wearing through out the day is h o r r i b l e It cakes up in heat and slides right of your skin. If you plan on just wearing this for a little while then its defiantly for you but if your going to school or work I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Smooth operator
customer_reviews.text: Nothing covers my dark purple perfectly, but this does a better job than any of the others I've tried. I like that it goes on easy because it is a liquid. It doesn't wrinkle up my skin like the lipstick kind does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Face Paint (In a Good Way)
customer_reviews.text: This will cover almost anything you have on your face, and with the right blender, it wont look like you have make up on. I also claim to have the most senstivie skin on the planet, and this doesnt bother it one bit!
customer_reviews.author: Karli G.

customer_reviews.title: Full Coverage? ABSOLUTELY NOT.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a full coverage concealer, came across this one... had good reviews so I went with it. I’m now convinced no one knows what full coverage is. It covered nothing. The consistency is thin, watery and somewhat oily. JUST NO. Garbage, will never use again.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Erases under eye circles
customer_reviews.text: I dab a tiny amount under my eyes before applying my foundation and my under eye circles vanish. Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: R. Matthew

customer_reviews.title: My favorite go-to concelear!
customer_reviews.text: This concealer does a fantastic job covering up my dark circles!!
customer_reviews.author: Mariposa

customer_reviews.title: Covers everything without looking heavy.
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. It is part of my daily routine.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Very Thick Good Concealer
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good thick concealer. It has great coverage but I use it lightly as it is thicker than other concealers I've used.
customer_reviews.author: NoName

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coverage with one application.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent coverage of my large dark skin patch. A little bit lighter and less peachy than my skin, but setting with my foundation powder made in all but invisible even when looking for if.
customer_reviews.author: B Perlik

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: My favorite concealer. Just wish they made a bigger version of it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cardoso

product_meta.title: Maybelline New York Facestudio Master Conceal Makeup, Medium/Deep, 0.4 fl. oz.
product_meta.description:
Color:Medium/DeepMaster Conceal by Face Studio from Maybelline New York is a master concealer. Our formula camouflages imperfections and dark circles with ultra-resistant full coverage. Maximum conceal. No reveal.

BRAND STORY
By Maybelline
feature_bullets: Camouflages flaws and dark circles with no telltale cover

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
